name: Penalty
text: Any person using such substantially identical or confusingly similar trade name as set forth in section 482-4, shall be fined not more than $1,000. [L 1925, c 174, pt of §1; RL 1935, §7454; RL 1945, §9289; RL 1955, §204-5; HRS ; am L 1980, c 26, §6; am L 2001, c 15, §7; am L 2003, c 124, §86]
